text: Speechless is the eighth studio album by Steven Curtis Chapman. The album was released on June 3, 1999. ==Track listing== # "Dive" – 3:57 # "Speechless" – 5:06 # "The Change" – 3:46 # "Great Expectations" – 5:02 # "Next 5 Minutes" – 4:19 # "Fingerprints of God" – 4:02 # "The Invitation" – 4:57 # "Whatever" – 4:01 # "I Do Believe" – 4:01 # "What I Really Want to Say" – 4:22 # "With Hope" – 5:12 # "The Journey" – 3:05 # "Be Still and Know" – 3:19 ==References== Category:1999 albums
title: Speechless
